ygData.subject: Re: Re: Favorite Weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t feel sorry for any cleric that can wear the Ivander s Hoop, let alone do the quest for it themselves :)  Ailamil
ygData.messageBody:
I don't feel sorry for any cleric that can wear the Ivander's Hoop, let alone do
the quest for it themselves :)

<<shakes his high elf head and signs>>

Ailamil Faithbringer

<<I would like to know if any DARK ELF clerics have successfully completed the
paw of opalla or testament of vanear quests. With my being KOS everyplace these
quests are given, it seems so difficult to complete =) (and soooo unfair to us
evil classes that we cannot get the BEST +wis items)

I've been trying to find a way to complete them - would help to know if ANY
other dark elves have obtained either item =)

Thanks!>>
